column5: gotta spool my new Tekota /Curado/Calcutta I know I know its been a long winter lol,the 2 Muskie reels going with a braid ,the Curado is where I need help what pd test should I be running on this ,its gonna be my light Pike, Bass, walleye rod whats a good braid for this thing 15lbs???? what brand????
gotta go power pro. didn't mean to rhyme.
2Tone, I have the 300 series Curado with PP and its fantastic. It casts a mile.
I've got 20 lb PowerPro on my medium baitcasting setup for bass and walleye. Include a fluoro leader of similar diameter and you should have no problems.  Mike
20-30 lb PP should do the trick!
Exact setup I use and it's been flawless for the species your looking for
Don't be afraid to go up to 40 lb braid on that Curado. RF
I don't trust any braid with less than a 30 lb. test! It'll pay for itself with the lures you DON'T lose!
ohh thats awesome fellers my Curados only the 200DHSV I think ill go the 20 pd PP
Got to second that!!!.  With no strech casting bigger baits one bad cast you watch you bait cast a mile without your line attached..
don't be afraid of going to 50# power pro on the curado.   that is what I use, it's my bass/pike setup. it's the same diameter as 12# mono.  for the muskie rods, 80 or 100#.
